title: Ep 246: Sensual BDSM & Fire Play (Ft. Sir Marvelous & Syphen)
itunes:title: Ep 246: Sensual BDSM & Fire Play (Ft. Sir Marvelous & Syphen)
description:
This week the duo is joined by another couple to teach us sensual BDSM. Domme Sir Marvelous and his sub Syphen join us in the studio to discuss the more sensual side of BDSM. As a dungeon owner, Sir Marvelous discusses how a dungeon differentiates from a sex club and why people seek out his services. This week’s Vanilla Sh-t we get into a man who had a 2 day erection and the longest erection we have all ever experienced with our partners. Both guests share safety tips from both the domme and sub perspective when engaging in BDSM. Have you ever considered fire play? Well we get into what fire play in BDSM is and how it can heighten the sexual experience.


Visit Sir Marvelous social links and book a session at all of his links here https://www.liinks.co/marvelousthings
